snippet.title: The Gatekeeper - Walkthrough
snippet.description:
0:31 - get grandma's diary.
1:14 - turn AC on, get a page from the diary.
1:24 - use page on diary. learn how to make ghost trap.
2:52 - hidden objects game - get elevator call button
3:13 - use elevator call button
4:59 - get a brick
5:00 - get a quarter
5:03 - get #18
5:11 - get #28
5:26 - use brick
5:31 - get #19
6:26 - get an empty cup
6:27 - use quarter
7:08 - seeking for the lost soul, get lock pick set
7:29 - use lock pick set, get sledgehammer
7:37 - use sledgehammer
7:41 - get #97, a sealed box and a blender.
7:56 - use blender. get cross.
8:30 - use cross. get holy scripture and Cain's coin
8:50 - use empty glass
8:53 - use glass of water
9:11 - get #97
9:20 - build a ghost trap
9:28 - find Cain's tomb
9:40 - use ghost trap
9:52 - use holy water
